official_title: A resolution authorizing two members of Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations staff to testify in a proceeding pending in the United States District Court for the Central District of California.

summary.text: Authorizes two members of Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations staff to testify in a proceeding pending in the United States District Court for the Central District of California.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing two members of Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations staff to testify in a proceeding pending in the United States District Court for the Central District of California.
